channel.title: rio's feed
channel.description: GIRLS IN MY COMPUTER. WE CAN DO IT

item.title: whenever i am annoyed i re-read orv for psychological healing. kim dokja i'm omw

officially technically my bday and i find out opm s3 is upon us. watched the trailer and got so excited i got out of bed to start pacing. i am going to enter a garou renaissance. no one will be safe. i pumped out essays upon essays of meta on this guy and i'll do it again.
added some pagination to this thang
btw i made a webring. wow! already kind of wanna redraw the widgets though
ðŸŒˆðŸŒˆ
every time i start working on this site it gets so out of hand so quickly lol
pondering the merits of making a webring for marine bio enthusiasts and appreciators...ðŸ¤”
life is crazayyy (twirls around)
wanna work on this site but i finally moved and there's just so much to do all the time! i'll make a real life blog post/photodump someday, but in the meantime, here's the balcony view.
why does it cost $100 to bring my adorable cat on a flight. she is so cute. you should be paying me!
saw a mention of 'mizuzu' in a poem today and looked them up and wow! they seem so similar to amarillos! we live in a beautiful world that brims with possibility...
started stress coding a pride page theme and now suddenly it's 5AM and the sun is rising?! love loses. AGAIN.
i am so busy. it should be against the law. i complete a task and then you know what happens? there are more tasks!
fiiiinally almost done de-bootstrapifying the site and i'm celebrating with a 2AM mcdonalds cheeseburger. i have the zoomies
i love staying up until 4:30AM nitpicking code i've already re-written 3 times (lying)
blah blah internet privacy anyways i can't think of what to put in the upper left corner of this selfie. chococat is off the table im afraid...perhaps chao from unico.
my laptop crashes 3-5 times a day now, so i swapped back to an older laptop and threw linux mint on it...the dawn of a new era?
omg can i insert a spotify embed here...YEAH WOOHOO!
thinking of her...
this feed is still buggy on mozilla. lame! oh well, will fix it someday.
people keep trying to uminekopill me which is so scary because i can vividly envision the reality where it works.
god the quirked up women you put on this earth to be high priestesses and fortune tellers are playing gacha games and drinking off-brand sparkling water
ok i know it's considered a bit tacky to advertise but if you make literally anything interesting you should submit it to cicada. i will send you a telepathic heart emoji.
getting my ass kicked trying to make the search form work i'm screaming crying etc. "TypeError" this "form is null" that...i am just some guy!
when normie phones get advanced enough i can take pics of the full moon in all its splendor it's over!!
sneak preview of a new epic procrastination theme
i am dying to re-code the hello world theme but i'm also very very very scared to see what ungodly things i was doing to that poor code. still...i want her back...

wanted to make another cute theme preview for the sunflower page theme, but...i'm tired! it's 4:13AM (lol) and i am impatient to release this thang!! maybe i'll make a 2nd preview some other time when i'm properly conscious.
if i was president i would make sparkling water free and invent a lighter that never runs out of fluid (also free) #VoteRio
made a website for vel's worstest oc hunter. it's disgusting and breaks on mobile.
i log on tumblr. i log off tumblr
marathoning osomatsu-san w some friends and getting hit with a chorus of "shes just like u fr" every time totoko is on screen. evil moe fish girl nation...rise!!
wistfully frying tofu to bÃ´a's duvet. happy friday to u all.
using this microblog rss script so i can finally post to my heart's content...i am at peace.
